channel.title: devops on DevOps Thoughts and Ruminations
channel.description: Recent content in devops on DevOps Thoughts and Ruminations

item.title: Clustering cinc or chef Part 1
item.description: This article is the first of a series about setting up Cinc or Chef as as a horizontally scalable service. This first post introduces the concept of which parts of the service need to be broken out to provide for a cluster.
